reviews.review_text: Great food reasonable price , service could be better ... Sometimes you get the main course before the starters ü§£ , or you might get the main course and not get the naans at all üòù . Still the food quality is good and let's be honest the rates are great given that it's goa üòÄ.

Food is great. The Cheese Garlic Naan is a must try. The ambience is so-so, reminiscent of a dhaba you'd find on the road. Service Quality is average. The order takes quite a lot of time although twice I've gotten the order pretty quickly.

Food I recommend :
Cheese Garlic Naan
Chicken Manchow Soup
Chicken Garlic
Chicken Afghani
Butter Chicken
Dragon Chicken

Avoid the Chicken Biriyani

Great place for some fulfilling Punjabi cuisine. Cheese Garlic naans alone are heavy. Gravy foods, both paneer and chicken are great. Chinese is nothing special but okay if you're alone and want a small serving. Shawarma maybe available depending on the time. Go for meat one if you're ordering. Mutton was not good, comparing to other places. Shakes are often served thin so mention before hand if you like thick chocolate shakes.
